dct_title_s: Mapemonde planisphere ou carte generale du monde
dct_description_sm: California as an island with a narrowing northern end.
Portion of northwestern continent above California is left blank. Antartic land mass almost reaches tip of South America. The eastern half of a very wide northwest passage is shown.
Title is also inscribed on banner below hemispheres in German: WELT-KARTE oder die NAUAT-KARTE der GANTZEN WELT
"C.P.P.S.V." at lower left corner. "Elias Baeck a. H. sculps. Et exc. A.V." at lower right corner.
